title: How You've Been
lyrics:
Well come gather round children it's time that you heard
The devil is after and how you're concerned how it'shard for the living on the edge of a knife
We you take your shot you won't be swinging twice
Well come hell high water and we ain't got nothing
In one hand's a bottle in the other there ain't one

Oh it's hard for the living so you put out both your eyes

But it's two for the both man and you will not pass him twice



Now it's not what your saying, and it's not what you said

It's how you been living, not a life but not quite dead

Well it's hard for the living, at least it is for most

But it's for fear of judgement you cry Father, Son and Holy Ghost
